description:
1、To prepare a friend, three things are required: to honor him present, praise him absent, and assist him in his necessities.

维护朋友， 有三件事情要做到：当面要尊重他， 不在场时要表扬他， 苦难时要帮助他。


2、Between friends all is common.

朋友之间不分彼此。

 

3、Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with a part of another; people are friends in spots.

友谊是两者思想的结合， 志趣相投才能成为朋友。


4、I know not whether our names will be immortal; I am sure our friendship will.

我不知道我们的名字能否永垂不朽； 我敢说我们的友谊会与世长存。


5、Be true to your word, your work, and your friend.

人应遵守诺言， 忠实自己的工作和友人。

 

6、The best that we find in our travel is an honest friend. He is a fortunate voyager who finds many.

旅行中最愉快的事是交到一个真诚的朋友。


7、The smell of coin is often the knell of friendship.

铜臭味浓往往是友谊的不祥之兆。


8、No man can be happy without a friend, nor be sure of his friend till he is unhappy.

没有朋友的人不会幸福，不处逆境不能识别朋友。

 

9、A friend is never known till a man has need.

需要之时方知友。

 

10、true friendship seeks to give, not take; to help, not to be helped; to minister, not to be ministered unto.

真正的友谊追求的是给予，而不是索取； 是帮助别人， 而不是被人帮助； 是为人服务， 而不是被人服务。

 

11、Old friends and old wine are best.

陈酒味醇， 老友情深。


12、A gentleman acts on behalf of an understanding friend, as a woman makes herself beautiful for her lover.

士为知己者用，女为悦己者容。


13、In the hours of distress and miser, the eyes of every mortal man turn to friendship; in the hour of gladness and conviviality, what is our want? It is friendship. When the 40、heart overflows with gratitude, or with any other sweet and scared sentiment, what is the world to which it would give utterance? A friend.

情绪低落时，人们会寻找友谊；欢乐的时刻，缺少什么呢？ 还是友谊。在充满感激之情或其他甜蜜神圣的感情时，又会说什么词呢？朋友。

 

14、Misfortune tests the sincerity of friends.

患难见真情。


15、A bosom friend afar brings a distant land near.

海内存知己， 天涯若比邻。
